name: Don Johnson
text: Fun experience. Instructors were patient.

name: T Reid
text: Had a great time! The owner and staff were fun, sweet, informative, and helpful! A fun group, family, or solo outing. Lots of great options for projects and keepsakes!

name: Lanitha
text: So much fun! Great service and super friendly staff. Thank you!

name: Larissa Shumaker
text: This place is absolutely awesome! So much fun!

name: LLBenJ
text: Excellent...quality instruction and a great time!

name: Rachel Grete
text: Fabulous addition to Montgomery! Love the workshops here!

name: Sara Crocker
text: This was the cutest shop! It's filled with art from local Alabama artists. Paintings, jewelry, decor, ornaments all great gift options. The owner was very sweet and personable. I'm excited to go back when I have more time to browse!

name: Tri Burban
text: Great place selling art, accessories and other items made by local artists. The owner is a beautiful soul who really cares about her craft, both as a proprietor and as one of the artists. I truly enjoyed my time in the store and wish them all success. Only reason for less than 5 stars is the lack of representation of the demographic of Montgomery. In a city that's majority African-American, I would live to see more artists of color.

name: Jeremy Lewis
text: Fun and quirky store of local arts and crafts, along busy Madison Ave commuter road, so parking on street requires care during rush hour. The paintings on the walls are by local primitives, with bright colors and two dimensions. There are examples of costume jewelry and pottery, likewise in the folk art genre. (This ain't SCAD or RISD). The treasure I found is a children's book written, drawn and produced by Tom Spencer, "Riley, Ace of Spies" with delightful illustrations by the author. In the best tradition, the text is as amusing on an adult level as for children.

name: ND Seibel
text: A great gallery/Co-op featuring a diverse range of local area artists. Affordably priced and uniquely Montgomery. Stock is always changing as these are currently producing artists.

name: Carolyn Humphries
text: Well laid out small business, reasonable prices, warm welcome by owner and clerks, no pressure to buy! Very nice visit..we will be back!!!

name: Mandy Ennis
text: Awesome store full of unique finds from local artists and makers! Perfect for finding unique gifts or art pieces for yourself.

name: Brett A. Snell
text: Friendly inviting place that (as the name implies) specializes in local products. There is something to be had for all. From trinkets to real artwork. Stop by and check it out.

name: Danny Davidson
text: Wonderful local artists sell their work here.  The work is great and the owners are lovely people!

name: June Johnson (Yaya)
text: Very good food. Nice, clean facilities. Quick service.

name: 2xperthands
text: Fresh, to order sandwiches with sides. Friendly, quaint, clean!

name: Jennifer Benefield
text: Had my daughter Maddie's "bleaching flannel" 13th birthday party there!!! Awesome place, awesome service!!!!!!! Alice is very friendly and helpful!!!!

name: Anna Nappier
text: Cute stuff,  didn't really have anything I was looking for.

name: Debbie Culpepper
text: Alice has the best gifts

name: Lisa Lou
text: Love this place!

name: chlorine adam
text: Food is great!

name: Daniel King
text: Rowan is awesome and absolutely nailed the atmosphere we were looking for. She made sure we were comfortable and was consistently checking on us during the sessions to make sure we were okay. Great communication, would highly recommend. We will definitely come back for the next tattoo

name: Mary Prentice
text: I got a tattoo here in March and the experience was great! Very professional, friendly, and mindful of cleanliness, especially during these strange times with COVID. She also paid great attention to the details that I wanted included in my piece and really customized it exactly to what I wanted. This tattoo is extra special to me because it’s a tribute to my late mother, and I couldn’t have asked for a better experience for this. ☺️💖

resp.text: Aww...enjoyed your company and am glad to have helped honor your Mom.

name: Justin Jenkins
text: Great experience overall. I was getting my first tattoo and the 5 stars and other reviews brought me in. I was a little nervous but once I got there it was very relaxing and the conversations were great. She always checks up on your and makes sure you are doing good. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Was great having you in! Loved the piece you let me do. Looking forward to seeing you again!

name: Elizabeth A
text:
Stumbled on this little place earlier this week and contacted to see if I could get in on Friday for 2 small tattoos in memory of my parents. I couldn't ask for a better experience. She took the time to explain every step, asked for my input before, during and after. She kept everything neat and clean, made sure I was OK afterwards, and made sure I got to my car safely. All in all a pleasant hour.

--cute squirrel tat 6/11/21

name: Rosalie Monroy
text: I had a tattoo in mind for a while, but I didn't decide on the exact design until 03/19. I have two large tattoos made by another artist but wanted to go a different route this time. I called a few places, and I left a message for Rowan in the afternoon after seeing other good reviews. Within a few hours, I received a text, and we messaged about the tattoo. Early Sunday, she texted me about a cancellation, and she was able to get me in for my tattoo on my forearm. Rowan has an incredibly soft hand. My tattoo is healing nicely. During the process, she made sure I was happy with the placement and with how my cross was shaded. I'm definitely going back to her for my next piece.

name: Carol Brown
text: She did excellent work! She gave my sisters and I tattoos...they are perfect!

name: Austin Boardman
text: I received a tattoo from the owner and it was amazingly done and she was very professional and kept me laughing and talking to me I highly recommend her for any tattoo your heart desires

name: Natalie Smith
text: I went for my first tattoo for my 18th birthday and the experience was better than I would have ever expected! Rowan did amazing on my tattoo and made me feel very comfortable, was very educational, and made sure to ask if my tattoo was exactly how I wanted it. She keeps her area very clean and was just overall highly impressive! 10/10 experience and I highly recommend!

name: Bryan Corona
text: Good prices and great work. Definitely coming back soon.

name: Cristal Grimes Alexander
text: I waited for 7 years to get the perfect tattoo in memory of my 19 year old son killed by a drunk driver, and I'm BEYOND HAPPY THAT I WAITED AND GOT IT HERE! AND DONE BY ROWAN!!!! She was absolutely amazing.  !!!!!!!!!!! Such a pleasure to talk to while getting a tattoo! Thank you so very much! AMAZING WORK

resp.text: Thank you hun. I am glad I was able to provide something positive for you to remember him by.

name: Shanderla McMillian
text: Thank you so much! The ink from my tattoo did not bleed out at all.  Rowan provide quality service and is very welcoming.  We talked and laughed the entire time and she answered all our questions.

resp.text: I am so glad you enjoyed your visit! I enjoyed it too!

name: Anne Strickland
text: Very happy with my tattoo.

name: Rachel Brock
text: Really good service for a really good price! I love my tattoo and look forward to going back to her for future projects :)

resp.text: ☺️👍 Thanks! Happy to see you whenever!

name: Real Patel
text: This is the first place, I have been to for my tattoo. But I dnt think I would try anywhere else for my next one. Rowan is such an amazing artist and she treats you like family. I am a bit too late for writing this review, since I got this tattoo done in August. Her work kept reminding me that I need to share my experience with this place for everyone else.👍😊

resp.text: Thank you so much! It was a pleasure working with you to create your tattoo. Looking forward to seeing you for your next one!

name: brian pierrot
text: Rowan is such an amazing artist! She has done amazing work on me. I have never left unhappy. She is also a good person to talk to and get to know. Her art work is extraordinary. I would recommend Rowan without a doubt!!

resp.text: You are too kind Brian! Always enjoy our sessions! See ya soon!

name: Cloe Conn
text: Great experience! I got my first tattoo here and Rowan was amazing. Talked me through the entire process, made me and my family feel super comfortable. Will go back soon!

resp.text: Thanks hun! Happy Birthday.

name: kris davis
text:
Rowan is an amazing artist. I trust her so much I  give her what I think I want. And she comes back with artwork that is beautiful.
She did a pice on my shoulder/ and top back shoulder area in memory of my mom. I get compliments all the time.
Love that woman!! You won’t be disappointed- she is amazing

resp.text: Thanks so much kris! You are super sweet! I enjoy our visits and I love the tattoos you have for me to do! See you soon!

name: Amanda Lewis
text:
Rowan did an amazing job redoing my tattoo that I originally got done at Artifacts!! It is PERFECT now.
She is very patient and really cares about her customers being happy.Loved talking to her and she is WAAAAAAAAY more professional and thorough than Artificats ever thought about being!! I will never get another tattoo done by anyone else. This was my first tattoo and was so upset when Artifacts didn't do a good job, but she made it a perfect, beautiful piece of art!!!!!! 💜🖤💜🖤💜🖤

resp.text: Awww glad you like it now!

name: Stephanie Evans
text: I’ve gone to Rowan for a couple of tattoos. Turned out beautiful! She’s an awesome artist and person. Such a kind heart and joy to be around. Visit her shop, you won’t be sorry!!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting me with your artwork! You are a joy to be around also and I am glad you keep coming to visit!

name: Haley Schrimsher
text: Rowan was amazing with my first tattoo! Clean shop, clean everything! She used all proper protective and sanitary measures and made me feel at ease and made sure what I wanted was perfect! Definitely recommend her and will be coming back. Tattoo also healed perfect!

resp.text: That’s what I love to hear!! Look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kristie B
text: Rowan did a matching tattoo for me and my two daughters all on the same day. We had a lot of fun with her.  It was a great experience as it was their first tattoo. She is very sweet and a great artist!

resp.text: Y’all were great! Hope the birthdays went well. See you again sometime!

name: Jamie Sawyer
text: She was very patient with me and my tattoo turned out beautiful!

resp.text: Appreciate you coming by. We try to treat clients in a way we would like to be treated. You were great!

name: Charlie Smitherman
text: Rowan did a fantastic job on my tattoo! Clean precise lines. She is very professional, has a wonerful soft touch and an excellent conversationalist.  Thank you guys!

resp.text: Glad you liked it! Was awesome to meet both you and the wife! Have to do it again some time soon!

name: shelby love
text: Rowan did an amazing job my husband, mother-in-law and myself went last night and we couldn’t been happier!! I’ll definitely be coming back to her!

resp.text: Happy to have been able to do the art for you! Y’all take care and see you soon.

name: Will Russell
text: I now have a beautiful piece representing my family. Very professional and honest. I will be going back to start on my big Navy piece I have wanted for years.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping in and giving us a try! Glad you are happy with your artwork! Looking forward to that Navy piece!

name: Vincent Powell
text: Excellent work, I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: Thanks! Loved doing your work!

name: Jackie Elliott
text: Great place to go. Rowan takes her time and does an amazing job. Will be back!!

resp.text: Always enjoy having you in! See you soon!

name: letia fuerste
text: Repeat x4.... Love her!! Work is always amazing... Clean shop.. Casual environment love it there 💜💜💜

resp.text: Always a pleasure to do your work hun! See you soon!

name: Raleigh Hargrove
text: I took my daughter there for her first tattoo and she was so nervous , but Rowan was so nice to her and kept her talking . she looks forward to her next visit .

resp.text: Loved having y’all in. Look forward to seeing you again!

name: Preston Hedges
text: I’ve got a lot of work done there the past year, very skilled and friendly artists there

name: Betty Greene
text: I highly recommend Nevermore. Thanks to Rowan for my newest tattoo.

resp.text: Tha pleasure was mine! See you again soon!!

name: Christina Reynolds
text: Friendly and knowledgeable, precise lines. Will be coming back for a cover up

resp.text: Looking forward to the challenge! Glad to have been able to provide what you needed. Thanks for coming in.

name: Christina Knight
text: Rowan is so funny and really talented! I plan to go here for all my future tattoos 😊

resp.text: Really enjoyed having you in! Looking forward to your next one.

name: Anna Perry
text: She is amazing!!!❤️

resp.text: Aww...thanks! Was nice to see you!

name: Arthur Zevack
text: Awesome place!

resp.text: Thanks for the support!

name: Alexandria Jones
text: Great service

resp.text: Thanks for the support!

name: Eve Niles
text:
Such an innovative and fun experience. Any age can create! I took my 7-year-old daughter and instructors were attentive, helpful, and patient with her. This could be anything from a fun family event to a nice date night!

We will definitely be back!

resp.text:
Eve...you and Paris did a great job...I can not wait until the pieces have been fired. Your daughter did an amazing job ALL by herself, she knew exactly how to break down the shapes and I think like grinding! : )
Thank you for giving me the opportunity to serve you and yours! You are going to have to bring your husband in next time!

name: Cresta Christensen
text: Such an awesome experience! My daughter and I went here for the first time yesterday and had a great time! Josh is a very patient, knowledgeable and friendly instructor. Very creative, organized atmosphere. We are already planning our next trip! Also... CALL THE STUDIO BEFORE YOU PURCHASE A GROUPON! Josh will honor that price without you having to purchase over Groupon, but he doesn’t lose a large percentage of the commission. So if you plan on going, just call the studio first! And you should DEFINITELY plan on going!

resp.text: Cresta it was a blast having you in the store. You and your daughter both did some really cool stuff. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Laura Brown
text: I really enjoyed the variety of designs and the unique challenges of designing glass pieces. A new and welcome experience!

resp.text: Laura I am glad you enjoyed the time you spent in the store creating. I appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon!

name: Denise Tevis
text: Josh and Lana are knowledgeable, helpful, and so friendly. They have a nice selection of tools and glass, including a discount glass section. My partner and I drove from Altanta to Dallas to buy glass for our stained glass projects. The owners answered all our questions and offered helpful tips and suggestions. We found everything we needed. Worth the drive—would definitely come here again!

resp.text: Denise so glad you stopped by and visited us at the store. Thank you so much for allowing us to serve you and your glass needs!

name: Abby Barton (abbyheartsbooks)
text: I have ZERO artistic talent and went into the class with no idea of what I wanted to do. Josh and his wife were AMAZING at easing my nerves and showing me how I can create a beautiful bowl regardless of my lack of talent. I went with friends (all of our first time there) and we had THE BEST TIME learning how to cut and shape glass. Josh was very good at explaining everything we needed to know. All my friends and myself agreed that we will keep going back to make more pieces. I HIGHLY recommend this class for mental/emotional therapy, date nights, friends bonding time, and any other reason you can come up with!

resp.text:
Abby...
Thank you so very much for giving me the opportunity to serve you and yours! It makes me extremely happy to know you had a great experience. As you have already been back to the store shows how much you enjoyed the process. Again thank you, will call soon to let you know your second piece is ready to pickup!

name: Heather Taylor
text: Fantastic experience!! Me & my best friend were wanting a fun new adventure.. a new thing to try.. a new creative outlet and this didn’t disappoint! We thoroughly enjoyed our evening, Josh and his wife were super helpful, so easy going & fun to be around, and all around wonderful!! Josh helped me make a bird for my piece and it was exactly what I wanted! They’re there to help but easily stand aside and let you and your creativity do your thing! ♥️♥️ I cant wait to go back and get our other bestie in on the fun!! I cannot wait to get my finished piece now!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming, so glad you had a great time! Can not wait to see you and all of your besties! See you soon!

name: Belinda Barker
text: I wanted a fun new activity for a friend's birthday and this was perfect!  Working with glass was intimidating at first but Josh's skill and patience made it easy and fun. He was especially terrific with my 10 year old daughter who was able to make a wonderful creation.  She wants to come back with all her friends, me too!

resp.text: Belinda...I am so glad that you, Jana and your daughter had a good time. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Denean Breed
text: My friends and I had a great time here.  We were able to make personalized, free-form creations on glass.  It was not at all a run-of-the-mill experience.  Jason was super helpful.  I am bringing my four teens soon for a little family time.  The experience takes about 2 hours.

resp.text: Thank you Denean...I am glad you had a great time. Hope to see you and the crew again soon. Please call the store as I still haven't had any contact with one of your party.

name: April P
text: Such a wonderful and  therapeutically calming experience.  Even if you've never done this before Josh is such a great instructor you'll be confident in work.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words April we will miss being in Dallas

name: A. Ray Harris, Jr.
text:
This PLACE IS AWESOME. My woman and I went on an Saturday morning in November. I was very apprehensive at first but ended the day loving my experience.

I made an Cigar ashtray and four coasters. Josh was very easy to undaunted and his glass cutting & breaking demonstrations will give you all the confidence you need to make an great piece of glass art.

resp.text: So happy you had a good time! Looking forward to seeing you again soon! I know Piece of Heaven Bakery next door will love seeing you Again as well! Tell Danielle to email me to confirm date and number of people coming next time!

name: Hannah Hutcherson
text: Josh and his wife were so amazing! Our first experience with infused glass and his guidance was great! You can tell them love for what they do definitely shows!! I win definitely be back 😊

resp.text: Hannah thank you so much I am glad you had a great time. Your pieces turned out great am sure you will be very pleased!

name: Jill Snelling
text: After months of search found Guidance Glass and now want to stand of the roof top and tell everyone!  I had purchased a gorgeous fixer upper corner cabinet with carved wood curved front and curved doors made of leaded glass.  Little did I know the difficulty of finding someone to replace broken panes!  Then I met Josh...he is the owner of the company and he changed everything.  He created beautiful curved pieces, took apart and replaced all the lead between the glass and then reinstalled it back onto the doors.  He even gave me choices if i wanted to update a color on certain sections.  He had great attention to detail, took his time to get it done the right way and was worth every penny.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

resp.text: Jill thank you for your kind words. I greatly appreciate you took the time to leave the review. The cabinet doors did look good once reinstalled. Thank you for giving me the opportunity to serve you! If I can be of any assistance in the future please let me know!

name: Jenn Mallett
text: We had so much fun fusing glass!

resp.text: Thank you so much will miss being in Dallas

name: Tina Altman
text: This was such a fun experience & I was really happy with how my project turned out. Josh was the best! He was so helpful & made sure we were satisfied with how everything looked. I’d definitely recommend this business :)

resp.text: I am so glad you had fun. I assume the coasters made it to you okay!

name: Joni Henderson
text: My sister and I went this weekend while we were traveling. We had a wonderful time. He was so helpful and patient. Recommend everyone to stop in and make wonderful art!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for stopping by on your visit to the Atlanta area. Next time you are in town stop by and build something else! I'll give you an out of town discount!

name: John Rowe
text:
Only going by previous ratings however, I am sooooooo excited to have stained glass back in this area.  I took lessons years ago on 92 in Hiram.  I love doing stained glass, while I  think I'm pretty good(MADE A PIECE with 207 pieces, my wife helped) I have so much to learn.  I'll be taking classes soon and I'll get back.
So far a 5 star just for being in Paulding County  - let's all help support this brave artist - talk about stained glass to everyone and especially Guidance Glass!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: John please make sure to come see me soon. As a school teacher we are only open Friday evenings, Saturday, and Sunday. I will work hard to outdo your expectations.

name: NY Grl
text: Josh is trying hard to give the art glass community what it wants and needs: a wide selection of glass and help from someone who knows and understands the glass artist. I hope his business expands and grows as the glass community finds out about him. Let's support this local business that's working hard to support us!

resp.text: I’m not sure who NGA GRL is but I greatly appreciate the support. Thank you for your kind words and encouragement. They were greatly needed.

name: britishcow
text: Got the groupon and it was definitely worth it. Great instructor.

resp.text: Thank you so much I am glad you enjoyed the experience. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Tammy Willis
text: What an awesome company.  I received one of their bouquets as a gift from my son who lives in Huntsville.  When I visited him this past June, I wanted to go to their store and arrange another bouquet for my home and have it shipped.  They were so friendly, helpful and talented in helping me arrange the perfect bouquet and having it shipped to my home in California.  Upon my return home, I received my package and unfortunately, the Post Office was a little rough with my package and damaged some of the flowers.  Anthony at Paper Petals assured me they would take care of me and that they did!  They replaced the damaged flowers in a very timely manner with great communication throughout the process.  Awesome customer service and I will not hesitate to use them again.  Their flowers are incredible, life like and beautiful.  Best part, I don't have to water or worry about dying.  Thank you!

resp.text: Hi Tammy, we're so glad you had a good experience with us (and that your replacement bouquet arrived safely!) It was great having you visit our studio and we really enjoyed arranging your bouquet together for you!

name: G Dunn
text: Beautiful flowers in store. I took a class to make cherry blossoms. Thao was a great teacher and very patient with us all. Everyone made beautiful flowers! LOVE

resp.text: Thank you for attending the class! It was so fun working with everyone. And we agree, everyone's flowers turned out lovely!

name: Mary Hinson
text: I went to Paper Petals Co at Lowe Mill and picked up and Zinnia Kit along with a cute vase! The kit came with all the materials needed and a code to the video tutorial. All you need are a pair of scissors! My family had such a fun time making these flowers and we were so happy with how they all came out!

resp.text: The flower you created looks gorgeous, Mary! Thank you to you and your family for giving our Craft Box a try!

name: Anastacia LaRocco
text: I don't even know where to begin when it comes to singing their praise. They are amazing when it comes to communication and they go above and beyond for their customers. I left a resin flower in their care that my father had made before he passed and I have been so nervous but they treated it with great care. Because of them my dad still gets to walk me down the aisle and I couldn't ask for more. They more than delivered on my wedding flowers and I'm so grateful they will forever be a part of my special day. Thank you so SO much!

resp.text: Staci, we absolutely loved working with you and your family! And seeing everyone's reaction to all of our flowers, especially the incorporation of your father's resin flower, made the occasion even more special. Thank you for choosing us to create such a sentimental piece for your special day!

name: Ashleigh Streeter
text:
I have followed Paper Petals Co. on social media for a couple of years now and have always wanted to order because their work is just so beautiful. I finally ordered two different items for Mother’s Day and WOW they did not disappoint! Absolutely stunning and detailed work! I am so happy with both bouquets. 10/10 Recommend!!

Also, the packing for the shipping was perfect and so well done! No concern about damage at all!

Everything I expected and more!!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers for Mother's Day, Ashleigh! We're happy that you're happy with our flowers! We hope you and your loved ones will enjoy those flowers for years to come.

name: Bridget Brooke
text: We are in love with Thao's amazing work! My husband surprised me for our anniversary with a paper version of my flower crown from our wedding, and with the most adorable cherry blossoms for my birthday. We also sent a Mother's day bouquet that was absolutely gorgeous. I cannot say enough good things, and now want to fill my entire house with these gorgeous creations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bridget! We loved recreating your flower crown and the rest of your florals so we're so happy to hear they were well received!

name: Delilah Steen
text: I love the craft boxes. The single stem and bouquets are also really great for presents. Shipping is fast and beautifully packaged.

resp.text: We're always overjoyed to hear love for our Craft Boxes! Thank you, Delilah!

name: Shalin Mody
text: They have the most wonderfully crafted paper flower bouquets 🤩🌺😍! I've received compliment after complement for the paper flowers I've sent friends and loved ones.  Even better is the story behind the business.  We're very fortunate to have them in Huntsville 😁

resp.text: Thank you for your appreciation for our flowers, Shalin!! It was really a pleasure to chat with you when you stopped by the studio!

name: Ashim Shrestha
text: Absolutely beautiful flowers, with top-notch craftsmanship! Brilliant choices, and selections to chose from. I used them for my niece's birthday party theme, and she loved it so much that she ended up using them in her room. Thao was so easy to work with and made sure she knew exactly what I wanted. Couldn’t be happier, highly recommend!!

resp.text: This really means a lot that she continued to use them in her room after the party! Thank you for letting us be a part of her special day!

name: conbuom
text: This place is everything! The craftsmanship, attention to detail, it’s all gorgeous. And all of the interactions with them were super professional and friendly. Plus the owners have built this business organically - from the ground up! Which is another reason I love to support them. Highly recommend.

resp.text: We are so happy reading your review conbuom, thank you so much for your praise! We feel blessed to have your support, so thank you for following along with us on our paper flower journey!

name: Mika Middleton
text: all around amazing work and excellent customer care. I will be purchasing from them again and again.

resp.text: Thank you, Mika! We always look forward to when you stop by the studio!

name: M Dohr
text:
Coolest bouquet I’ve ever bought for  my gal.

She loved it and it will last .. timeless

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers!!

name: Mariah Johnson
text: We used Paper Petals for our wedding flowers. They were beautiful and we got so many compliments. They looked real!! The best part is we still have them for memories and decorations in our home. Thao was wonderful to work with. She listened to my vision and made it come to life. I would nightly recommend her flowers to anyone for any occasion! Well worth the money.

resp.text: Mariah, it was such a pleasure working with you to create your bridal bouquet!! For our flowers to be a part of your special day and knowing that they are still brightening up your home, that makes our day. Thank you so much for trusting us with your wedding flowers!

name: Jacklyn Parham
text: Excellent teacher beautiful flowers

resp.text: Thank you, Jacklyn!! We're glad you were able to join us for the classes!

name: Janet Elledge-Nauman
text: I purchased a bouquet for my niece.  When they arrived she said they were really beautiful and she was glad that they were made by a local artisan!

resp.text: Thank you for supporting us local artists!!

name: Ishan B
text: Great selections of flowers at their location in Huntsville. Can be scented as well. Better to gift these flowers as they won't decay and  thrown out after few days and can always be nice decor anywhere you put them. I recommend 5/5.

resp.text: Thank you for stopping by our studio. We're so glad to hear that you appreciate our forever flowers!

name: Kathleen N
text: During this strange chaotic time, I was looking for something to spark a sense of joy. I started in my venture of wanting to grow flowers/plants, but knowing I have a black thumb. As a result, I started looking into paper flowers. Instagram recommended Paper Petals Co. after some search, and I began reading up on the company’s mission statement. I will be honest and say, I also have a very soft spot for Asian women entrepreneurs who are thriving in their businesses. I am so excited to eventually get many more flowers, but I did send a bouquet to a friend and can’t wait to see my friend’s reaction. With that said, I am incredibly impressed by Thao’s talent, her passion for her work, and her kindness as a human. It’s been such a pleasure conversing with her, and I plan to continue supporting this business that brings so much happiness.

resp.text: Reading your words of kindness and encouragement have truly made our days, Kathleen! Thank you so much for all of the support you've given us and we cannot wait for you to one day visit our studio!

name: melissa nguyen
text: ppc is a really wholesome company. They’ve been so passionate about their work ever since the beginning and it shows. Their flowers are stunning and its totally worth a look !

resp.text: If our passion is visible through our work then we've succeeded! Thank you, Melissa!

name: Mariah Zielke
text: Thao’s flowers are so beautiful! The perfect dainty addition to my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Mariah!! We're happy that our flowers can be decorating your home!

name: Emaley Thomas
text:
I'd met the owner of this shop at an event & fell in love with her work. When I was walking through Lowe Mill one day I saw that she had opened up shop recently via her social media and I will forever be buying flowers from her.
The quality of work is unlike anything I've seen in paper flowers. You can tell not only by talking to her but by her attention to detail she is doing what she loves. The flowers are vibran, well-constructed,  and one of a kind. Will always come back to buy more.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your compliments, Emaley!! It is so good to hear that the little details are not going unnoticed, so thank you for your love for our flowers!

name: jean beasley
text: I’ve taken a couple of workshops from Thao (the owner). She is a great teacher! I enjoyed the workshop so much, I bought crepe paper, wire and pan pastels to make my own. (I’ve now taught my mom how to make crepe paper flowers.) I’ve also bought quite a few flowers from Thao to decorate my home. I love her flowers!

resp.text: Jean, it's always a pleasure anytime you stop by and we have a chance to work together! Thank you for spreading the love for paper flowers!

name: Priscillia Engelking
text: Beautiful handcrafted bouquets with colors even brighter than the pictures! The customer service and timely shipping is also great. I have purchased multiple bouquets for my house as well as gifts.

resp.text: It's been a joy putting together bouquets for you! Thank you for your support, Priscillia!

name: Brianna Haynes
text: I have purchased flowers multiple times and recently attended a workshop to create my own paper flower.  Thao's flowers are absolutely stunning. At times I have even forgotten that they aren't real.  The workshop was fun and informative.  The instruction was clear and easy to follow and the materials are excellent quality.  I will be attending more workshops in the future.

resp.text: It is a pleasure every time you visit the studio, Brianna! Thank you for all of your support!

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
I found out that Paper Petals sells craft boxes and decided that I needed one ASAP before I ended up with cabin fever and a dead husband (I kid!)

I placed my order on Saturday and it was delivered Sunday. I cried, it’s honestly that exquisite, and such a welcome distraction from all that’s going on in our world today. I don’t have a creative bone in my body, but it’s been a lovely activity. Thank you so much, Thao!!

resp.text: Sunny, you are too sweet!! It really means a lot that my Craft Box could bring you such a good experience during this crazy time. Thank you so much!

name: Valerie DePalma
text: Their flowers are gorgeous and they have lots of different options to make bouquets or to purchase ones already made. If you don't live in Huntsville you can have them shipped as well and they'll come in perfect condition!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our flowers, Valerie! We always try to have many different options for everyone to match any occasion, so we're glad you found the right arrangement here!

name: Salwa Jeries
text: Loved the peonies class, it was so much fun and super relaxing! Her works are beautiful and last forever!

resp.text: We're happy to know you found the workshop fun and relaxing, that is definitely our goal! Thank you for attending!

name: Sulav Darnal
text: Absolutely in love with The Paper Petals. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sulav!!

name: The Stever’s
text: Wonderful flowers 💐 truly love them but the price point is high

resp.text: Thank you for your review and we're happy to hear you love our flowers!

name: Claire Young
text: We loved the flower workshop! An afternoon well spent. We'll definitely go again!!

resp.text: It was great having you attend our workshop and we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Martin Nguyen
text: Beautiful work!!! High quality people and products!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Martin!

name: Anna B
text: What a fantastic experience! Miriam and George were very helpful and fun to work with. This was my first project at AR workshop and I can not believe I was able to make something so beautiful. I will definitely be back.

name: Nana
text:
My daughter and I attended a 2 day craft workshop/retreat.  It was great fun and we left with 6 completed projects.
George and Miriam and their staff were extremely knowledgeable, patient and kind.
This was the first time we had attended anything like this...so at times we needed a little extra guidance.
We were extremely happy with our finished projects... thanks George, Miriam and staff 😊

name: Ashley Kemper
text: AR Workshop is the perfect location to enjoy an afternoon of crafting with your family or group of friends. Projects range from wooden signs to beer bottle openers to lazy susans and more. Each class takes about three hours to complete, but is well guided with a helpful staff member and the time flies by! There is also a super cute retail selection available with locally made peanut brittle and other gifts. Such a great addition to Dothan!

resp.text: We cannot wait to see you back in the workshop real soon.

name: Regina Ward
text: Another great afternoon spent crafting!  If you have any opportunity sign up for a class or drop in to see all their awesome premade retail designs.  George and Miriam make you feel like an artist...with zero stress!  Thank you both, Christine and I had a great time today

resp.text: Regina, Thank You for the kind words.  We love having you in the Workshop and consider you part of our family.  Looking forward to seeing you again on Thursday night.

name: Mary Kate Moring
text: We had a BLAST this weekend with George and Miriam (owners)! They were SO personable and helpful during our project.  The facility is tidy and so super cute. I chose the Christmas Countdown calendar and it was a ton of fun. I will definitely be back and I would recommend this experience to anyone...and who does not love using a power tool...

resp.text: Mary Kate, Thank You so much for choosing AR Workshop Dothan to spend your afternoon.  You were an absolute joy and hope to see you soon. George & Miriam..

name: Malorie Sellers
text: AR Workshop Dothan is so much fun! Our group had various levels of crafting and DIY experience, but we all walked away with beautiful custom projects. From lazy susans to bottle-cap collectors, and wood-plank signs. We had a blast choosing our paint colors & techniques, and learning to use power  tools! And while our projects dried, we shopped around the delightful boutique--so many candles, ornaments, and unique gifts to choose from. I'm looking forward to returning soon to work on my next project!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review.  We so enjoyed having your group at the Workshop and can't wait to see you again.  Remember to keep up with us on FaceBook and InstaGram.  Should you find yourself needing a unique, custom gift or anything from our boutique, contact us and we will be glad to assist you.

name: Rick Jenkins
text: George and Mirium Sellers work hard to provide an experience where you, your family or your companies staff can go and have a few hours making priceless memories.  I would highly recommend AR Workshop Dothan for anyone that wants a relaxing break in their hectic life, an opportunity for some real bonding time and to make a unique special item that will be treasured for years to come.

resp.text: Thank You, Rick ...  Looking forward to having you and Lynn in the workshop real soon.

name: Christopher Calvin Reid
text: I highly recommend this fun activity and the employees who make it happen!

resp.text: Thank You, Christopher for your kind words.  Miriam & I are having a blast helping our customers create customized home decor in Dothan.

name: Jason Sumner
text: Love this place! Great products made with love.

name: betty blankenship
text: Did not visit this place
